mapper.select: WITH T AS( SELECT chat_rm_no , user_id , host_yn , user_no FROM chat_users ) , J AS ( SELECT a.chat_rm_no , a.user_id , b.user_nm , b.user_img , c.dept_no , d.dept_nm , f.cst_cd_nm FROM chat_users a INNER JOIN users b on b.user_id = a.user_id INNER JOIN emp_info c on c.user_id = a.user_id INNER JOIN dept d on d.dept_no = c.dept_no INNER JOIN custome_code f on f.cst_cd = c.jbgd_cd ) SELECT DISTINCT T.* , J.* FROM T LEFT JOIN J on J.chat_rm_no = T.chat_rm_no AND J.user_id = T.user_id WHERE T.chat_rm_no = #{chatRmNo}

SELECT a.chat_msg_no , a.chat_rm_no , a.user_id , a.chat_msg_cn , a.reg_dt , a.file_yn , b.user_nm , d.dept_nm , f.cst_cd_nm FROM chat_msg a LEFT JOIN users b on b.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN emp_info c on c.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN dept d on d.dept_no = c.dept_no LEFT JOIN custome_code f on f.cst_cd = c.jbgd_cd WHERE 1=1 AND chat_rm_no = #{chatRmNo} ORDER BY reg_dt ASC

SELECT DISTINCT a.chat_rm_no , a.user_id , a.user_no , NVL(MAX(c.reg_dt),d.crt_dt) as reg_dt FROM chat_users a LEFT JOIN chat_room b on b.chat_rm_no = a.chat_rm_no LEFT JOIN chat_msg c on c.chat_rm_no = a.chat_rm_no LEFT JOIN chat_room d on d.chat_rm_no = a.chat_rm_no WHERE 1=1 AND a.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY a.chat_rm_no , a.user_id , a.user_no , d.crt_dt ORDER BY reg_dt DESC
mapper.update: MERGE INTO CHAT_ROOM CR USING (SELECT #{chatRoomVO.chatRmNo} as TMP_CHAT_RM_NO FROM dual) TMP ON (CR.CHAT_RM_NO = TMP.TMP_CHAT_RM_NO) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CR.USER_ID = #{chatRoomVO.userId}, CR.CAHT_RM_NM = #{chatRoomVO.cahtRmNm}, CR.CRT_DT = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( CHAT_RM_NO, USER_ID, CRT_DT ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(chat_rm_no),0)+1 FROM CHAT_ROOM), #{chatRoomVO.userId}, SYSDATE )
